query:
SELECT 
                token_offer_id AS offer_id,
                hex_to_decimal(offer_amount) AS amount,
                offer_maker AS source,
                end_date AS expire_at,
                order_hash as hash,
                currency_address
            FROM token_offer
            WHERE token_offer.contract_address = $1
                AND token_offer.chain_id = $2
                AND token_offer.token_id = $3
